column2: mean_age = format(round(mean(value, na.rm = TRUE), digits = 2), nsmall = 2),
sd_age = format(round(sd(value, na.rm = TRUE), digits = 2), nsmall = 2)
unite(col = "mean_age", mean_age, sd_age, sep = "", remove = TRUE),
